articles.author: Mark Gurman
articles.title: Apple (AAPL) Growth Opportunities: Southeast Asia and Africa, Lower-End iPhone - Bloomberg
articles.description: Apple has long relied on China and the iPhone for growth. As those revenue sources continue to falter, the company must explore new regions and products to get back on track. Also: Apple’s next big thing is an on-device large language model; iPad retail avail…
